decision_conditions: 1	SCHEDULE 1: CONDITIONS IMPOSED BY THE REGULATIONS
1. The consent shall expire after 5 years from the date of this notice.
2. Any advertisements displayed, and any site used for the display of advertisements, shall be maintained in a clean and tidy condition to the reasonable satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority.
3. Any structure or hoarding erected or used principally for the purpose of displaying advertisements shall be maintained in a safe condition.
4. Where an advertisement is required under these Regulations to be removed, the removal shall be carried out to the reasonable satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority.
5. No advertisement is to be displayed without the permission of the owner of the site or any other person with an interest in the site entitled to grant permission.

6. No advertisement shall be sited or displayed so as to obscure, or hinder the ready interpretation of, any road traffic sign, railway signal or aid to navigation by water or air, or so as otherwise to render hazardous the use of any highway, waterway (including any coastal waters) or aerodrome (civil or military). Note: These are imposed automatically unless expressly varied, for instance the time limit shortened
| SCHEDULE 2: CONDITIONS IMPOSED BY THE AUTHORITY
7. The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

Block Plan, Design and Access Statement, Design Concept and Materials (Revision B), Existing and Proposed Sections, Existing East and West Elevations, Existing Ground Floor Plan, Existing North and South Elevations, Existing Site Plan, Proposed East and West Elevations (Revision PL02), Proposed Ground Floor Plan, Proposed Roof Plan
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

8. The illumination of the sign(s) /advertisement(s) shall comply with the recommendations of the Institution of Lighting Professionals in their Professional Lighting Guide "PLG05 2023 "The Brightness of Illuminated Advertisements including Digital Displays", including the following operational features:
Post curfew (11:00pm-07:00am): display off or level reduced to 50% of pre-curfew level.
Daytime level: to be set according to Table 10.5 of PLG05 2023.
Static images to be displayed only (no moving or flashing images).
Vertical illuminance of sensitive facades shall not exceed the recommendations for Environmental Zone 3 of the ILP 'Guidance Note 01/20 For The Reduction Of Obtrusive Light'

Reason: To ensure that the amenity of occupiers of the application site and surrounding premises is not adversely affected by artificial lighting, in accordance with Policies D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
description: Installation of new signages to front; installation of signage to west elevation; installation of 2x flex light boxes; installation of 6 free stand units; all round boarder in aluminium profile with strip light; laminated glass partition with frosted sticker pattern (Advertisement Consent)
